about.hero_subtitle: Leading Global Industrial Markets with AI-Powered Proactive Business Engine
about.mission_desc: Breaking away from static corporate websites and passive e-commerce operations, we build an 'autonomous sales and marketing business engine operating 24/7' with fully integrated AI.
about.value_innovation_desc: Revolutionizing traditional B2B sales with AI technology
about.value_trust_desc: Official partner of global leading brands
about.partnership_3m_desc: Official industrial solution distribution partner certified by Korea 3M. Supplying genuine products including VHB Structural Tape, Cubitron II Abrasives, Scotch-Weld Adhesives, and safety equipment.
about.partnership_exact_desc: Korea's official partner of German EXACT Tools, supplying the complete product line. Providing professional pipe cutting solutions including PipeCut series, Infinity unlimited diameter cutter, and battery/pneumatic models.
about.capability_ai_desc: 24/7 AI chatbot, real-time quote system, behavior analysis-based personalization
about.capability_global_desc: B2B partnerships and import/export capabilities in Middle East and Asia-Pacific regions
about.capability_expertise_desc: Delivery track record and technical support for plant, shipyard, and construction sites

global_business.intro_desc: We are not just a distributor. As a proactive business partner equipped with AI technology, we work together 24 hours a day for your success.
global_business.model_distributor_desc: Exclusive or official distribution rights for specific regions/countries. Marketing support, technical training, inventory management support provided.
global_business.model_oem_desc: Product supply under your brand. Minimum order quantity (MOQ) negotiable. Quality assurance and delivery compliance.
global_business.model_project_desc: Joint bidding and delivery for large-scale plant, construction, and shipyard projects. On-site technical support and A/S provided.
global_business.capability_3m_desc: Tape & Adhesives, Abrasives, Safety Equipment - Genuine guarantee with official distribution certification
global_business.capability_exact_desc: German premium equipment - 15mm to unlimited diameter, electric/battery/pneumatic models complete
global_business.capability_ai_desc: Provide estimated price range within 3 seconds for bulk orders. Based on 10,000+ past transaction data learning
